summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2209 for the improvement of the east side of Sixteenth Avenue, from East Jefferson Street to a point 100' north thereof, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concert walks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 22341 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
